maqras.text: 44|17|Pes az onon niz qavmi Fir'avnro ozmudem va pajomʙari ʙuzurgvor ʙa sujason omad
44|18|[Va ʙa onon guft] Ki «[kori Bani Isroil in] ʙandagoni Allohro ʙa man voguzored, ki man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari aminam
44|19|Va [niz] ʙar Alloh taolo ʙartari macued, ki man ʙarojaton daleli ravsane ovardaam
44|20|Va az in ki sangsoram kuned, ʙa Parvardigori xud va Parvardigori sumo panoh meʙaram
44|21|Agar ʙa man imon nameovared, pas, az man kanora ʙigired [va rahojam kuned]
44|22|On goh ʙa dargohi Parvardigoras duo kard, ki: «[Bor iloho] Inon guruhe taʙohkorand»
44|23|[Ba Muso vahj kardem, ki] «Bandagonamro saʙona [az Misr] ʙerun ʙiʙar, zero [sipohi Fir'avn] sumoro ta'qiʙ xohad kard
44|24|Va darjoro orom pusti sar ʙiguzor, ki onon sipohe hastand ki ƣarq xohand sud
44|25|Ci ʙisjor ʙoƣhovu casmasorhoro, ki raho kardand [va raftand]
44|26|Va kistzorhovu qasrhoi naku [va zeʙo]
44|27|Va ne'mate, ki dar on [sodmon] ʙudand
44|28|[Sarnavistason] In guna [ʙud] va [tamomii] on ne'mathoro ʙa guruhe digar voguzostem
44|29|Osmonu zamin ʙar [noʙudii] onon qatrai aske narext va muhlate [ʙaroi tavʙa] niz najoftand
44|30|Be tardid, Bani Isroilro az azoʙi xorkunanda nacot dodem
44|31|Az Fir'avn, ki [rohʙari] sarkase dar zumrai isrofkoron ʙud
44|32|Mo ʙo donisi Xud Bani Isroilro ʙar mardumi zamona ʙartari dodem
44|33|Va nisonahoe [az qudrati xes] dar ixtijorason guzostem, ki ozmoise ravsan dar on ʙud
44|34|In musrikon megujand
44|35|«Cuz margi naxustini mo hec [zindagii digare] nest va hargiz ʙarangexta naxohem sud
44|36|Va agar rost megued, nijogonamonro [zinda kuned va] ʙijovared»
44|37|Ojo eson ʙehtarand jo qavmi [nerumandi] Tuʙʙa' va pesinijoni onho, ki cun ʙazahkor ʙudand, halokason kardem
44|38|Va Mo osmonu zamin va on ciro, ki mijoni onhost ʙa ʙozica najofaridaem
44|39|Onhoro ʙa haq [va ʙo hadaf] ofaridaem, vale ʙestarason namedonand
44|40|Be tardid, ruzi dovari [qijomat] va'dagohi hamai onon ast
44|41|Ruze, ki hec duste ʙaroi dusti xud sudmand nest va [az hec su] jori namesavand
44|42|Magar kase, ki Alloh taolo [ʙar u] rahm kunad, ki U sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
44|43|Be gumon, daraxti Zaqqum
44|44|ƣizoi gunahkoron ast
44|45|[Mevaas az siddati harorat] hamcun misi gudoxta dar sikamho mecusad
44|46|Monandi cusisi oʙi garm [cusidaistoda]
44|47|[Xitoʙ merasad] «On [sitamgor]-ro ʙigired va ʙa mijoni duzax darafkaned
44|48|On goh az azoʙi oʙi doƣ ʙar saras furu rezed»
44|49|[Dar on hol ʙa u gufta mesavad] «Bicas, ki tu [dar mijoni qavmi xud] izzatmand va ʙuzurgvori
44|50|In hamon [sarnavisti dardnoke] ast, ki dar mavridas tardid dosted»
44|51|Jaqinan parhezkoron dar cojgohi amne hastand
44|52|dar [mijoni] ʙoƣho va [kanori] casmasorhoi ʙihist
44|53|Liʙoshoe az deʙoi nozuk va deʙoi zaxim mepusand, dar hole ki rujorui jakdigar [ʙa suhʙat] nisastaand
44|54|Cunin ast [vaz'i onon] va hurijoni ƣizolcasm [-i ʙihisti]-ro ʙa hamsarii onon darmeovarem
44|55|Dar on co har mevae, ki iroda kunand, ʙe daƣdaƣa dar ixtijorason ast
44|56|Dar ʙihist ta'mi margro naxohand casid, cuz hamon margi naxustin va [Parvardigori mehruʙon] az mucozoti duzax ʙarkanorason dostaast
44|57|[In] Baxsisest az [coniʙi] Parvardigorat va in hamon komjoʙii ʙuzurg ast
44|58|[Ej pajomʙar] Mo Qur'onro ʙa zaʙoni tu ravon [va oson] soxtem, ʙosad, ki [musrikon] pand girand
44|59|Pas, dar intizori [va'dahoi ilohi] ʙos, ki ʙe gumon, onon [niz] muntazirand
45|1|Ho, mim
45|2|Nuzuli [in] kitoʙ az coniʙi Allohi sikastnopaziri hakim ast
45|3|Ba rosti, ki dar osmonho va zamin nisonahoe [az qudrati ilohi] ʙaroi mu'minon [padidor] ast
45|4|Va [niz] dar ofarinisi xudaton va mavcudoti zindae, ki [dar zamin] parokanda mesozad, ʙaroi ahli jaqin nisonahoe [az tavon va tadʙiri Alloh taolo oskor] ast

45|5|Va dar gardisi pajopaji saʙu ruz va rizqe, ki Alloh taolo [ʙa surati ʙoron] az osmon mefiristad va ʙo on zaminro pas az xazon va xuskias zinda mesozad va [niz] dar gardisi ʙodho ʙaroi xiradvarzon, nisonahoe [az qudrati Parvardigor] ast
45|6|[Ej pajomʙar] Inho ojot [va nisonaho]-i ilohist, ki ʙa haq ʙar tu mexonem [Ba rosti, musrikon] pas az [suxani] Alloh taolo va ojotas kadom suxanro ʙovar mekunand
45|7|Voj ʙar har duruƣgui gunahkor
45|8|[On kofire] ki ojoti ilohiro, ki ʙar u xonda mesavad, mesunavad, vale mutakaʙʙirona ʙar muxolifat isror dorad. Gui onhoro nasunidaast. Pas, uro ʙa azoʙe dardnok ʙasorat ʙideh
45|9|[Hamon ki] cun ʙar gusae az ojoti Mo voqif savad, onro ʙa masxara megirad. Onon azoʙe sanginu dardnok [dar pes] dorand
45|10|Pesopesi eson [dar oxirat] duzax ast va dastovardason va [jovaronu] korsozone, ki ʙa coji Alloh taolo ʙarguzidaand, hec sude ʙa holason naxohand dost va azoʙe sahmgin [dar pes] dorand
45|11|In [Qur'on muciʙi] hidojat ast va kasone, ki ojoti Parvardigorasonro inkor mekunand, azoʙe az saxttarin azoʙhoi dardnoki [duzaxro dar pes] dorand
